an9.42:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anando kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
an9.42:1.2: Atha kho ayasma udayi yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata anandena saddhim sammodi.
an9.42:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma udayi ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
an9.42:3.1: Katamo, avuso, sambadho, katamo sambadhe okasadhigamo vutto bhagavata”ti?
an9.42:3.4: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya,
an9.42:3.8: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
an9.42:3.9: Ime kho, avuso, panca kamaguna sambadho vutto bhagavata.
an9.42:4.1: Idhavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi …pe… pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:4.2: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, sambadhe okasadhigamo vutto bhagavata pariyayena.
an9.42:4.5: Yadeva tattha vitakkavicara aniruddha honti, ayamettha sambadho.
an9.42:5.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:5.2: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, sambadhe okasadhigamo vutto bhagavata pariyayena.
an9.42:5.5: Yadeva tattha piti aniruddha hoti, ayamettha sambadho.
an9.42:6.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu pitiya ca viraga …pe… tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:6.2: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, sambadhe okasadhigamo vutto bhagavata pariyayena.
an9.42:6.5: Yadeva tattha upekkhasukham aniruddham hoti, ayamettha sambadho.
an9.42:7.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:7.2: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, sambadhe okasadhigamo vutto bhagavata pariyayena.
an9.42:7.5: Yadeva tattha rupasanna aniruddha hoti, ayamettha sambadho.
an9.42:8.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:8.2: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, sambadhe okasadhigamo vutto bhagavata pariyayena.
an9.42:8.5: Yadeva tattha akasanancayatanasanna aniruddha hoti, ayamettha sambadho.
an9.42:9.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:9.2: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, sambadhe okasadhigamo vutto bhagavata pariyayena.
an9.42:9.5: Yadeva tattha vinnanancayatanasanna aniruddha hoti, ayamettha sambadho.
an9.42:10.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:10.2: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, sambadhe okasadhigamo vutto bhagavata pariyayena.
an9.42:10.5: Yadeva tattha akincannayatanasanna aniruddha hoti, ayamettha sambadho.
an9.42:11.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.42:11.2: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, sambadhe okasadhigamo vutto bhagavata pariyayena.
an9.42:11.5: Yadeva tattha nevasannanasannayatanasanna aniruddha hoti, ayamettha sambadho.
an9.42:12.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati, pannaya cassa disva asava parikkhina honti.
an9.42:12.2: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, sambadhe okasadhigamo vutto bhagavata nippariyayena”ti.
